targets.query:
import "date"

max_value_threshhold = if "${is_max_value_threshold_used}" == "On" 
  then 10 ^ int(v: "${max_value_threshold_exp}")
  else 10 ^ 100

from(bucket: "irem")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 10m, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop:date.add(d: 10m, to: v.timeRangeStop))
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "irem_d1" and r._value <= max_value_threshhold
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

list.description: Makes the dashboards more human-readable by cutting off high values. Cuts off the values > 10ⁿ where n is the "Max value threshold exponent" value.
list.label: Use max value threshold
list.name: is_max_value_threshold_used

list.description: [Integer] Cuts off the values > 10ⁿ where n is this parameter's value.
list.label: Max value threshold exponent
list.name: max_value_threshold_exp
